summary: Near the end of WWII, Germans transport the immortal heart of Frankenstein's monster to Japan, where it is seeming lost in the bombing of Hiroshima. Years later a wild boy is found, born from the immortal heart.
cast: Nick Adams|Kumi Mizuno|Tadao Takashima|Yoshio Tsuchiya|Kôji Furuhata|Jun Tazaki|Susumu Fujita|Takashi Shimura|Nobuo Nakamura|Kenji Sahara|Yoshifumi Tajima|Kôzô Nomura|Haruya Katô|Ikio Sawamura|Yoshio Kosugi|Keiko Sawai|Noriko Takahashi|Peter Mann|Ren Yamamoto|Yutaka Sada|Hisaya Itô|Kenzô Tabu|Shigeki Ishida|Nadao Kirino|Yutaka Nakayama|Senkichi Ômura|Tadashi Okabe|Toshihiko Furuta|Kenichiro Kawaji|Hideaki Nitani|Shin Ôtomo|Shôichi Hirose|Hideo Shibuya|Saburô Iketani|Haruo Nakajima|Bin Furuya|Shigeo Katô|Akio Kusama
keywords: doctor victor frankenstein character|psychotronic film|baragon character|frankenstein's monster|nazi zombie
title: Furankenshutain tai chitei kaijû Baragon
